favourite.article: Glorious vision! Wow! Thank you for this vision! May we grow in the Lord and see this vision. Lord, give us sight that we may see.
Lord we give ourselves afresh, into Your training hands to be. Praise the Lord!
He molds us to be vessels of Your glory!
O Lord, we give ourselves afresh, Into Your training hands to be, Molded, shaped, and worked on daily, To be vessels of Your glory!
I really like this hymn especially the chorus.... O LORD JESUS.
Lord I give myself, I want to be a vessel of Your glory! Amen...
Lord recover my heart, that I may give myself afresh to You, Lord thank You, for all the situations that You gave to me for me to molded by You. We praise You for the uniqueness of Your recovery.

May all my life and work declare! the uniqueness of Your recovery! Praise the Lord for Your economy! Dispensing, wrought Yourself into us, make home in all of our heart. I give Thee back the life I owe, my life is meant for God's economy!
O Lord, we give ourselves a fresh, into your training hands to be, molded, shaped, and worked on daily, to be vessels of Your glory!!!! Amen!!! O Lord Jesus!!
I Love You Lord! Thank You for the Uniqueness of Your recovery! Amen!
Praise the Lord that we are in the unique recovery of the LORD. We must continue to pursue this wonderful Christ that we have for us to be is His unique recovery. AMEN.
Yes.....it is really nice to be in the unique recovery of the Lord, so we must also live in this vision according to His ordained way and may our lives meant for God's economy only.
Amen. O may we live with the uniqueness of the Lord's recovery. We need the grace and mercy of God to live with a good testimony.

Glorious vision, I have seen it: My life is meant for God's economy! Earthly bondage, I have left it: My heart outpours for the Lord's recovery!
May all my life and work declare, Uniqueness of Your recovery To build Your Body, prepare Your bride, To bring You back, fulfill Your longing!
O Lord we give ourselves afresh. Amen.
We count all things loss and be the overcomers of today to pave the way for the coming back of our Lord. Come quickly Lord!

Outwardly, our human life will encounter many different situations and many many problems, but once you have seen the glorious vision, we really can say "my life is meant for God's economy!". Christ in you the hope of glory.

"May all my life and work declare uniqueness of Your recovery". Such line is so enjoyable yet so exposing. I can't help but pray: Lord make me absolute for Your recovery. Cause me to be obedient to the heavenly vision, may we all stand bold like Paul was able to say to any man, I was not disobedient to the heavenly vision. We need to renew our consecration for this matter.
I give myself afresh into Your training hands. Daily mold me, shape me, and work on me. I want to be a vessel of Your glory! May all my life and work be for You and the Body.
May all my life and work declare, uniqueness of Your recovery!
I love this song very much. Thank the Lord for the 1 week training in Nueva Ecija. I learned a few lessons. I learned a few songs like Glorious Vision and In this godless age. Thanks very much, God.
We must consecrate ourselves to Him. Lord Jesus, we love You. We want You. We give ourselves afresh to You. Amen, Hallelujah!!!!!!
Praise Him for the uniqueness of the Lord's recovery! Hallelujah!
